data.title: American Primeval Netflix series production put on hold amid Hollywood writers’ and actors’ strike; Here’s everything we know
data.meta_description: American Primeval has stopped filming due to the ongoing strikes in Hollywood, but the series is still on. Here are the details.
data.text:
Synopsis

American Primeval has stopped filming due to the ongoing strikes in Hollywood, but the series is still on. Here are the details.

Netflix is big on action thrillers and the streaming giant has got together with Peter Berg and Eric Newman for a limited series. Titled American Primeval, the series had started filming but production has now been halted for the time being. The reason for the stop in schedule is the ongoing writers’ and actors’ strike in Hollywood.

Here’s what we know of the limited series American Primeval, including plot, cast and more:

What is American Primeval about?

Whatsonnetflix had exclusive reports of a synopsis of the upcoming series, that went as:

“Traveling West with her son, Sara joins a Mormon caravan headed in the same direction but bloody conflict erupts between the Native Americans and those claiming the land for themselves.”

Now, Netflix has revealed that American Primeval will be a limited series with only six episodes. The official synopsis of American Primeval by Netflix is as follows:

“American Primeval is a raw, adventurous exploration of the birth of the American West. The violent collisions of cultures, religions and communities as men and women fight and die for control of this new world – for a land they truly believe is their destiny. The ensemble tells a story of the sacrifice all must pay when they choose to enter a lawless and untamed wilderness.”

Cast of Netflix’s American Primeval

Rachel Tenner is the casting director of the series. While Taylor Kitsch was announced as the series lead in December 2022, the other members of the cast were disclosed in January 2023.

Here’s the list of cast members of Netflix’s American Primeval:

Jai Courtney as Virgil Cutter.

Kyle Bradley Davis as Tilly.

Dane DeHaan as Jacob Pratt.

Betty Gilpin as Sara Rowell.

Nick Hargrove as Cottrell.

Derek Hinkey as Red Feather.

Saura Lightfoot Leon as Abish.

Preston Mota as Devin Rowell.

Shawnee Pourier as Two Moons.

Joe Tippett as James Wolsey.

Shea Whigham as Jim Bridger.

When will American Primeval resume production?

American Primeval began filming in February 2023 and continued shooting until July 2023, but stopped the schedule due to the WGA and SAG-AFTRA strikes. The series was filmed at the Netflix Studios in Albuquerque and in Santa Fe, reports Whatsonnetflix.

The New Mexico Film Office informs that the production had on board as employees, over 4,000 New Mexicans, with 3,420 as background talent, 750 as crew members, and 20 principal actors, as reported by Whatsonnetflix.

Some 100 days of shooting are still left to wrap the series, and until the strikes are on, filming will not resume.

FAQs

What is the role of Taylor Kitsch in American Primeval?

Taylor Kitsch plays the role of Isaac in American Primeval, who is a traumatized man struggling to live.

Who are the creators of American Primeval?

American Primeval is a collaboration between Peter Berg’s Film 44 and Eric Newman’s Grand Electric along with Netflix. They have previously partnered on another limited series, Painkiller.
